item.description:
Join the Harvard Humanist DIscussion Group and the Harvard Humanist Contemplative Group on a joint hike at Great Brook Farm in Carlisle, MA on Sunday, July 18.

We will split into two teams for the hike: a "discussion" group, and a group that will use the hike as a walking meditation. Both groups will reconvene for ice cream and socializing afterwards!

Great Brook Farm is half an hour away from Cambridge, so those interested in carpooling will meet at the Bertucci's parking lot at Alewife at 10:30 am. Everyone else should plan to meet in the parking lot at the Farm at 11:30.

Please bring your own bagged lunch, plus plenty of sunscreen and bug spray.

For more information, see: http://www.mass.gov/d...

[See who is attending from the Harvard crowd at http://www.facebook.c...]
item.name: Hike and/or meditation with the Harvard Humanists
